Blog.post: Sorry for not updating last night, I was tired so I went to bed. I mean it isn't like anyone reads this anyways...but hey who knows, maybe I'll be famous, and someone will find it and make a book out of it. It'll put kids to sleep, but hey, I'll be makin moolah..HaHa...HEY! We all have dreams...lol but anywhoo, it's just been the same boring last 2 days, nothings really happened, so ya know...but I'm sleepy so I'm gonna finish my conversations and head off to bed. G'nite and Sweet Dreams!! =D

Sorry about not posting last night, I was kinda tired, so I went to bed. haha I mean, it isnt like anyone is reading this anyways, maybe I'll be famous one day, and someone will find this and make a book out of it. It'd put kids to sleep but hey, I'd be rich...haha Yes, I am a loser...I know this...but anywhoo, it's been the same boring night, nothings happened, so I'm gonna finish up my conversations and go to bed. G'nite and Sweet dreams!

WE WON THE GAME!! HaHa!! We got 'em 45-6 lol anywhoo...my day was just peachy, the stupid machines took my money, and didnt give me change, so yeah. but when i got to the game I hung out with my friend, so its all gravy =D wow, I'm such a loser! haha But yes, I'm gonna go do somthing now. just updating you on my boring life...so yeah....TOOTLES!
Blah! That's all today was. Blah! I ran today, a lot. HaHa and now, I have a headahce, and want to go to bed; but i can't because i have to study. =( So thats what I'm doing, then off to bed. G'nite!
Yes, it is I! HaHa I'm such a loser! But anywhoo! It was just one of those days. Nothing exciting happned, like usual. So I just wanted to say that then head off to bed. Goodnight All!!

Hola! Whats goin' on? Nothing really here. It was just the same boring day, but hey, it's Fitzgearld, what do you expect? Today was quite uneventful too. So yes, with that, this is nothing but another entry to my boring life. Why can't anything exciting ever happen to me?? =/ Caio!

Well, I made it through school! Yippie! Then I came home and took a nap. HaHa I had showchoir pracitice tonight, so yeah, that was fun (not). Well, my homework is done, and I'm about to head off to bed so goodnight and sweet dreams! =D

Long. That's all today was. I was in Moultrie all day with the band and didn't get in until like 11:30. Yep, I went to bed at like 1. So I'm really sleepy, if i make it though today at school then I'll write again this afternoon if somthing happens, but its Fitzgerald, so I doubt it will. But yes, until then. Caio!
Welp, its been the same boring day. Nothin's happened...go figure. I sat around and played pool all day...how big of a loser am I?? HaHa Well, I'm going to go and continue to play pool. Tootles!!
Yay!! I have a blog!! Gooo mee!! haha Yes, I'm a dork, I know this =D Nothings happened today, I'm just seeing how all this works...if somthing does happen, I'll post, but until then. Goodbye!
